message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a unique and valuable item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $1400000 for the product. Looking forward to your response.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand that you have a budget constraint, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1400000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1550000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I still believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I would like to propose a price of $1450000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and our current discussion.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment, but I still need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to go slightly lower, but not all the way to $1450000. I can offer it to you for $1525000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and my costs.

I understand your position, Alice. I've carefully considered the situation, and I'd like to propose a final offer of $1475000 for the product. This amount takes into account both the value of the product and my budget constraints. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
